name: Machine Crisis (陨星危机)
description: Machine Crisis is a sci-fi VR shooter, player fight gigantic bio-mechs with guts and wits
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later, or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 / GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
